Storm Name Hurricane Milton
NWS Office Tampa Bay Area/Ruskin
Begin/End Date 10/08/2024-10/10/2024
Fatalities 3 - Direct
7 - Indirect
Tornadoes 12
Event Summary
Hurricane Milton made landfall along the west-central Florida peninsula coast as a category 3
